GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: increments the votes of the :review_id review, requires a request body object with a 'inc_votes' key and a numeric value. Returns the updated review object

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments posted to :review_id review

comments.body: Laboris nostrud ea ex occaecat aute quis consectetur anim.
comments.author: cooljmessy

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to the :review_id review, and returns the new comment object

comment.body: Laboris nostrud ea ex occaecat aute quis consectetur anim.
comment.author: cooljmessy

GET /api/users.description: returns a list of all users
